commit.message: Normalize MIR with RevealAll before optimizations.

files.patch:

@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@ +// compile-flags: -Z mir-opt-level=3 -Z inline-mir + +#![crate_type = "lib"] + +// EMIT_MIR issue_78442.bar.RevealAll.diff +// EMIT_MIR issue_78442.bar.Inline.diff +pub fn bar

( + // Error won't happen if "bar" is not generic + _baz: P, +) { + hide_foo()(); +} + +fn hide_foo() -> impl Fn() { + // Error won't happen if "iterate" hasn't impl Trait or has generics + foo +} + +fn foo() { // Error won't happen if "foo" isn't used in "iterate" or has generics +}
